publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4330 Alex Johnstone: Crack Cocaine in Aberdeen—That the Parliament expresses deep concern at the crack cocaine problem in Aberdeen and Aberdeenshire, as reported in Holyrood; commends Grampian Police on its substantial seizures to date of this highly addictive and dangerous drug, and calls on the Scottish Executive to provide all necessary assistance to help stop the use of this drug, the purchase of which is often funded by crime.

S2M-4330 Alex Johnstone: Crack Cocaine in Aberdeen—That the Parliament expresses deep concern at the crack cocaine problem in Aberdeen and Aberdeenshire, as reported in Holyrood; commends Grampian Police on its substantial seizures to date of this highly addictive and dangerous drug, and calls on the Scottish Executive to provide all necessary assistance to help stop the use of this drug, the purchase of which is often funded by crime.
S2M-4330 Crack Cocaine in Aberdeen (lodged on 2 May 2006) Nora Radcliffe*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4330 Crack Cocaine in Aberdeen (lodged on 2 May 2006) Ms Maureen Watt*
